title: Trump: USA 'hottest country in the world'

title: President Trump arrives at military parade

title: Trump says Putin called to wish him a happy birthday and talk Iran
shortDescription: Trump, who turned 79, said: "President Putin called this morning to very nicely wish me a Happy Birthday, but to more importantly, talk about Iran."

shortDescription: President Trump said the shootings of two Minnesota state lawmakers "will not be tolerated" and that the FBI is investigating the attack.

title: 'We knew everything,' Trump tells Reuters about Israel's strikes on Iran
shortDescription: Trump had repeatedly pushed Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to delay an Israeli attack to give diplomacy more time.

title: Trump administration grants air pollution exemptions to 66 coal-fired power plants
